articles.title: BNB Chain DEX volume surges - Examining what it means for BNB's price - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: The chain is experiencing growth in transactions but it may not be the same for the coin price.
articles.content:
• The increase showed that attention was shifting back to the chain.
  • BNB’s price might fall to $580 despite the rise in TVL.
For the first time since the 2nd of May, BNB Chain’… [+2861 chars]
